title: Can't Start League
body:
So I've been trying to figure out the main problem to my league of legends game, I have uninstalled, and reinstalled the game multiple times, and cant figure out what the problem is all i get is this error message.

The Application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005).

Can anyone help me with this because I am at a rut, and can't figure out what my problem is, I have updated all my drivers, and everything league runs off of to the newest updates, but nothing work's. Is there something I'm missing like a program update, or something please help.

replies.body:
We've seen this issue every few months. It typically happens if you have AVG installed, as it will sometimes block League from running. You can resolve this by either updating AVG or ensuring League's processes have been [whitelisted in AVG](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3).

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
